content: There are 7 days in a week. How many weeks are there in a year? Include your logic.

There are 52 weeks in a year. My logic is that there are 365 days in a year, and since there are 7 days in a week, dividing 365 by 7 gives approximately 52.1428571. So, there are 52 full weeks in a year, with one extra day. In a leap year, there are 366 days, which would mean 52 weeks and two extra days.
